About the Company: Tamil Nadu Newsprint & Papers Ltd (TNPL)is engaged in the manufacture of newsprint and printing and writing paper by using bagasse as a raw material.The company caters to the needs of multifunctional printing processes like sheet-fed, web offset, and digital printers.The product range of the company includes ultra white maplitho, elegant maplitho, hi-tech maplitho, creamwove, copy crown and copier.The company also manufactures writing paper and markets them under the name Eezee Write. TNPL manufactures a range of eco-friendly notebooks..The company also in the business segment of Paper, Cement, Energy.
